WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's up to you to set the correct values in PHPExcel, not for PHPExcel to convert your strings to numbers
WorkItem.Description:
when excel is created data is populated dynamically . in amount column some amount are picked up as integer (which is correct, as we expect it) but in the same loop other amount are set as text or general , which is very unexpected giving a green flag in the cell saying "convert to numbers"

I want to populate all the data as integer , not the general or text
